caption.p: RDA ordination diagram of the nine biotic traits of E. crassipes and four species diversity indices. C-leaf, N-leaf, C-stem, N-stem, ABU, HEI, COV, C/N-leaf, and C/N-stem represent the total carbon content of the leaves, the total nitrogen content of the leaves, the total carbon content of the stem, the total nitrogen content of the stem, abundance, height, E. crassipes coverage, C:N of the leaves, and C:N of the stem, respectively.
